name: igc-xc-score
description: igc-xc-score is a paragliding and hang-gliding XC scoring program in vanilla JS

scripts.build: rollup -c && nexe -i igc-xc-score.min.js -o dist/igc-xc-score.exe -t windows-x64 && nexe -i igc-xc-score.min.js -o dist/igc-xc-score-linux-x86-x64 -t linux-x86 && nexe -i igc-xc-score.min.js -o dist/igc-xc-score-macos -t darwin-x64-12.15.0 && webpack && cp www/index.html www/pacman.svg dist

author: Momtchil Momtchev <momtchil@momtchev.com>
